column6: Internship in Education Policy, Organization and Leadership
column7: Supervised direct experience in the administration of higher education. With the aid of the faculty, students select the internship relevant to their career goals. Same as EOL 589. 2 or 4 graduate hours. No professional credit. Approved for S/U grading only. May be repeated to a maximum of 8 hours; no more than 8 hours may be earned toward an advanced degree. Prerequisite: Consent of instructor.
